name: Android Based Barcode QRcode Scanner
tagline: This is android application for scanning QR code or bar code. After scanning the code, a form appear where more information like user's name, contact no, or any other notes can be added. After submitting the form, the information will be go to support team or admin. Admin will find the information in his account.
body:
### Android Based Barcode QRcode Scanner

This is an android application for scanning QR code or bar code. After scanning the code, a form appears where more information like the user's name, contact no, or any other notes can be added. After submitting the form, the information will be sent to the support team or admin. Admin will find the information in his account. 

![naai](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30968787/87339323-41d57400-c568-11ea-9a45-ea89b0f9dc16.gif)
***
